item.title: Awwmg help with 2 errors on funzone castle!
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

NPCHandler.java:1055: not a statement ItemHandler; ^ NPCHandler.java:1100: illegal start of expression public int GetNpcKiller(int NPCID) { ^ 2 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

wtf? this is what i posted on my npchandler.java to give the errors,

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { ItemHandler; if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 188) { ItemHandler.addItem(16, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 795) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.IQ(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1625 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1604 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2035) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomSlayeritem65(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1625 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1604) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomSlayeritem75(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1605) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomSlayer99item(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1604) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomAbyssal(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType >= 2591 && npcs[NPCID].npcType <= 2741) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.Obby(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

what should it look like?
